question: I have an application through Pennie but have not enrolled, I believe I could be eligible to enroll using a Qualifying Life Event based on my income. How can I enroll in Pennie using this Qualifying Life Event?
text:
I have an application through Pennie but have not enrolled, I believe I could be eligible to enroll using a Qualifying Life Event based on my income. How can I enroll in Pennie using this Qualifying Life Event?
          
        
Pennie has added a new qualifying life event for new customers who have an annual household income equal to or below the 150% federal poverty level. Below is a table that shows the income amount.






Household / Family Size






Income 150% FPL










Single






$20,385










2-person






$27,465










3-person






$34,545










4-person






$41,625










6-person






$55,785










8-person






$69,945







For other family sizes, please 
to this link
.
If you think you are eligible and you currently have an application through Pennie but have not enrolled in a plan, you will need to re-submit your Pennie application.
